abstract: Cerberus Capital Management is among the suitors for Lockheed Martin’s military training services division, which has a $500 million price-tag, Reuters reported.
snippet: Cerberus Capital Management is among the suitors for Lockheed Martin’s military training services division, which has a $500 million price-tag, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Cerberus Capital Management is among the suitors for a Lockheed Martin division that provides military training services and is being marketed for around $500 million, Reuters reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Cerberus Said to Eye $500 Million Lockheed Unit
